lead_paragraph: Physical clashes involving young refugees have become a focal point in state elections, and a test of the chancellor’s push for integration.

headline.print_headline: Far Right Trading on Merkel’s Refugee Policies in Her Home State
headline.main: Far-Right Party Trades on Merkel’s Refugee Policies in Her Home State

snippet: Physical clashes involving young refugees have become a focal point in state elections, and a test of the chancellor’s push for integration....
abstract: Attempt to integrate Middle Eastern and African migrants into Rostok, Germany, housing bloc leads to violent clashes with right-wing activists; incident in Chancellor Angela Merkel's home state underscores increasing vulnerability of her ruling coalition to far-right parties like Alternative for Germany.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and Africa Migrant Crisis
